content_descriptors.notes: This game contains mild Science Fiction violence. Use of Guns. Mild blood splashes. Attacking monsters.

name: Assault On Proxima Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 Bit
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit, Dual Core 3.0GHz processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or DirectX 12 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 Bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 3.0 GHz or faste
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or DirectX 12 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
